demos.name: Robust Control
demos.label: Robust Control Demos
demos.description:
The Robust Control features are an extension of the Control Toolbox which enables the design of uncertainty-tolerant multiloop feedback systems. Capabilities include:

  • Robustness Analysis
    • sigma plots (singular value Bode plots)
    • Mu-analysis (real, complex and mixed)
  • Model-Order Reduction
    • balanced truncation (for small absolute error)
    • balanced-stochastic-truncation (for small percentage error)
  • Multiloop Controller Synthesis
    • LQG/LTR Loop Shaping
    • Mixed-Sensitivity Optimal Loop-Shaping
    • H-two Optimal Control
    • H-infinity Optimal Control
    • Mu-Synthesis
  • Continuous and sampled data design
  • Model building
  • Plant augmentation
  • Curve-fitting, robust eigenspace computations

Altogether the Robust Control features consist of more than 150 MATLAB m-files providing comprehensive support for the design of uncertainty-tolerant multiloop feedback systems.
